imdb.plot outline: Little Luis, set in NY, is an animated series about an six year old Latino troublemaker and his adopted white family the Millers. Luis has just started first grade, with his crew and best friend, a special needs cat named Garcia and they are about to experience the world for the first time.
imdb.title: Little Luis
plot: _Little Luis_ (qv), set in NY, is an animated series about an six year old Latino troublemaker and his adopted white family the Millers. Luis has just started first grade, with his crew and best friend, a special needs cat named Garcia and they are about to experience the world for the first time.::Mr. Mist
synopsis: Little Luis, is an animated show about a present day dysfunctional, but loving white family and their adopted 6 year old Latin son Luis, set in Westchester NY
